thread.title: Joez
thread.title_full: Absafe Specialist Equipment reviewed by Joez

author: Joez
title: Joez
text: I have used sundstrom products before and the latest purchased from absafe specialist equipment is even better, I bought the kit with storage container, mask, particle and gas filters, this is a superb mask for the best protection and is compatible with the breathable air regulator and breathable air filter for compressor which can be purchased separately, the quality is superb, nothing left out when it comes to your health, all the products I have seen on absafe specialist equipment are excellent quality branded products
